---
title: "Making Multiple Columns"
date: last-modified
format: html
categories:
  - "Extra Writeups"
---

The following Quarto code:

::: {.callout-note title="Quarto Code Using `::: columns`"}

<pre>
Hello this is my document

::: columns

::: {.column width="50%"}

Here is column 1

:::
::: {.column width="50%"}

Here is column 2

:::

:::
</pre>

:::

Produces the following rendered output:

::: {.callout-note title="Rendered Output Using `::: columns`"}

Hello this is my document

::: columns

::: {.column width="50%"}

Here is column 1

:::
::: {.column width="50%"}

Here is column 2

:::

:::
:::
